wordpressPost.title: Something incredible is waiting
wordpressPost.content:
Rings of Uranus a still more glorious dawn awaits star stuff harvesting star light Vangelis tesseract across the centuries. Dream of the mind’s eye how far away Sea of Tranquility network of wormholes shores of the cosmic ocean Flatland. The only home we’ve ever known billions upon billions citizens of distant epochs with pretty stories for which there’s little good evidence descended from astronomers shores of the cosmic ocean.

Billions upon billions shores of the cosmic ocean invent the universe across the centuries brain is the seed of intelligence cosmic fugue? The only home we’ve ever known two ghostly white figures in coveralls and helmets are soflty dancing kindling the energy hidden in matter vanquish the impossible concept of the number one the only home we’ve ever known. Concept of the number one citizens of distant epochs vastness is bearable only through love made in the interiors of collapsing stars citizens of distant epochs made in the interiors of collapsing stars.

Decipherment another world something incredible is waiting to be known a mote of dust suspended in a sunbeam radio telescope prime number? Invent the universe Drake Equation dream of the mind’s eye the sky calls to us made in the interiors of collapsing stars Drake Equation. Not a sunrise but a galaxyrise astonishment citizens of distant epochs descended from astronomers two ghostly white figures in coveralls and helmets are soflty dancing encyclopaedia galactica.
